# Tic Tac Vue
A take on the classic and timeless game Tic-Tac-Toe

## about
What better way to get familiar with new frameworks than a tic-tac-toe game?! This is my take on this and I hope you like it. Challenge your co-workers, family and friends!
- Choose your custom names
- Scoreboard enabled (its a game after all!)
- Reset game and score (for you bad loosers out there ðŸ˜‰)
